com.elseforif.utility

类 String1

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elseforif.utility.String1

  • public final class String1
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some basic string manipulation methods, along with some useful string constants. For testing operations, see package com.elseforif.utility.validation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • Replace

        public static java.lang.String Replace(java.lang.String value,
                                       java.lang.String from,
                                       java.lang.String to)
        Replace all occurences of 'from' in string 'value' with 'to', and return the result.
        参数:
        value - the original string
        from - the substring to be replaced
        to - the new value to be substituted for 'from'
        返回:
        the new string

      • Alphabetize

        public static java.lang.String Alphabetize(java.lang.String string)
        Remove any non-alphabetic characters from 'string'.
        参数:
        string - any string
        返回:
        only the letters found in 'string'

      • AlphanumericsOnly

        public static java.lang.String AlphanumericsOnly(java.lang.String string)
        Remove any character from 'string' which is not alphanumeric.
        参数:
        string - any ol' string
        返回:
        only the alphanumeric characters in 'string'

      • Digitize

        public static java.lang.String Digitize(java.lang.String string)
        Remove any nondigit from 'string'.
        参数:
        string - a string, preferably containing a number
        返回:
        just the digits, please

      • NumberOnly

        public static java.lang.String NumberOnly(java.lang.String numberString)
        Return only the characters in 'numberString' which form a number. This can be nagative and can also contain a decimal. Any but the first decimal are discarded.
        参数:
        numberString - a string probably containing a number
        返回:
        the number portion of the string

      • StringEscape

        public static java.lang.String StringEscape(java.lang.String string)
        Insert the character '\' before each '"' found in 'string'. Or in other words, replace all occurrences of """ with "\"", so that the resulting string can be delimited in quotes without the risk of syntax errors.
        参数:
        string - any string
        返回:
        a new string with all double-quotes escaped

      • SafenSQL

        public static java.lang.String SafenSQL(java.lang.String text)
        已过时。 see class DatabaseUtility instead

      • Repeat

        public static java.lang.String Repeat(java.lang.String string,
                                      int repeatTimes)
        Repeat 'string' 'repeatTimes' number of times, and return the result.
        参数:
        string - a string to be repeated
        repeatTimes - the number of times 'string' is to be repeated
        返回:
        the complete resulting string

      • Repeat

        public static java.lang.String Repeat(char character,
                                      int repeatTimes)
        Repeat the given character the specified number of times, returning the result.
        参数:
        character - a character to be repeated
        repeatTimes - the number of repeats
        返回:
        the resulting string

      • ToString

        public static java.lang.String ToString(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Return a string representation of 'exception', including its stack trace.
        参数:
        exception - an excetpion to be made into a string
        返回:
        a string form of the exception
